data.title: Lorraine Toussaint - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Lorraine Toussaint: her birthday, what she did before fame, her family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Known best for her starring role as Rene Jackson in the Lifetime series Any Day Now, she also had series regular roles on Saving Grace and Crossing Jordan. Her film credits include an Independent Spirit Award-nominated performance in Middle of Nowhere and a co-starring role in Dangerous Minds.

Before Fame

After graduating from Manhattan, New York's High School of Performing Arts and from the world-famous Juilliard School, she began her career as a classical stage actress. She first appeared on screen in a 1986 television movie titled A Case of Deadly Force.

Trivia

She was a series regular on the ABC sitcom Where I Live and a recurring character on One Life to Live, Law & Order, Ugly Betty, and several other television series.

Family Life

A native of Trinidad, she settled in New York City at the age of ten.

Associated With
